name: Everything as it Is
description:
After falling unconscious in the remote arctic wilderness, you find yourself caught up in a sequence of events that will determine the fate of the human race. Do you have what it takes to face Everything as it Is?

This game was made for the 2018 GGDA "Thanksjamming" game jam. 

======================================================

Copy of readme:

This game may have bugs. Please do not use this feature unless you find yourself unable to progress: press 8 to skip to level 1. Press 9 to skip to level 2. Press 0 to skip to the final boss fight. If the game does not start, run the UE4PrereqSetup in Engine/Extras/Redist/en-us to install prerequisites. Normally this should not be necessary for the game to run.

WARNING: This video game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised. This video game contains some profanity.

Controls: Look at a blue object and press E to select it, then look at a green area and use left click to move it there. Right click to fire.  WASD to move. Spacebar to jump.

This game has not been optimized and may not run properly on less than recommended hardware. Some animations and collisions (including level transition triggers) are reliant on a playable framerate (20+ fps). GTX 960/equivalent Radeon card or higher recommended.
